basic_info.name: Mohan Babu University Placement
description: The Mohan Babu University has a dedicated Training and Placement Centre (PAT) whose prime responsibility is to maintain good relations with leading Service and Products national/international MNCs and organizations, invite them for recruitment drives, and foster career counseling services to students by organizing guidance lectures in collaboration with Senior Corporate Professionals and recently placed Alumni. In addition to this, PAT is responsible and accountable for conducting seminars, workshops, Industrial visits, placement-oriented training, mock interviews, aptitude tests, and group discussions followed by expert sessions on Technical and HR interviews in association with professional trainers.

In other words, we can say that this training and placement cell plays a very important role in creating wonderful placement records for MBU. Last but not least, weekend training classes for entrance exams like GATE are conducted with the support of professional trainers and are under the supervision of this cell to motivate the aspirants to pursue higher education in IITs & NITs/desire to work for PSU. basic_info.name: Mohan Babu University Campus Life and Facilities
description: The Andhra Pradesh-based Mohan Babu University is situated on 50+ acres of eco-friendly land and has a vibrant and diversified teaching-learning environment for students and faculty members so that teachers can educate ambitious youths beyond books and hard-coded curriculum and students in return can utilize the world-class facilities to study freely, create memories, explore their passions and interest areas and unfurl their dreams by connecting with amazing minds from all over the world.

In other words, we can say that MBU is not just an educational institution but a place witnessing millions of dreams and watching them come true in all essence. Lastly, to ensure the overall personal, professional, global, cultural, and innovative growth of students and work professionals, a comprehensive learning platform and industry-driven curriculum have been developed by the University. Cited below are some of the world-class facilities PU has for its students.

Digital Learning Spaces: The Mohan Babu University has established digitally enabled and modern classrooms to ensure students can receive the most refined learning experience in a collaborative and personalized classroom atmosphere.

Centralized Computing Facility: To fulfill the computing requirements of students, staff members, and teachers and make them digitally aware and proficient, MBU has established a Central Computing Facility that provides high-speed LAN connection for 2500+ systems in the campus with 1 Gbps to each end user. Along with this, CCF maintains 20 Servers of various functionalities along with Dell SAN and NAS devices in a centralized Server room.

Central Library: To add to students' and faculty's knowledge and help them in their research and project work, a vast library with aesthetically developed reading rooms has been established in an area of 4500 sq. M. by the University. In addition to this, this library is spread over Ground + 2 floors, is well-resourced with a central air-conditioning system, fire alarm, CCTV, and RFID book security system, and within the Central Library, a Digital library is also there for conducting NPTEL video courses in the different fields of education. Also, this library is home to 1,42,422 volumes of References and textbooks of national and international authors, International and national Journals and non-book materials related to the fields of Basic Sciences, Engineering and Technology, Humanities and Social Sciences, 22,000 titles, 1258 back volumes, 2988 CDs and DVDs. Additionally, more than 2929 e-journals on national and international levels have been subscribed by the University to use in this central library.

Transportation: To help students and faculty members reach the University on time, the MBU has a fleet of buses to provide pickup-drop facilities from different parts of Tirupati city. Also, students and staff members can avail of the bus facility by submitting a request to the SAO in the Administrative block.

Cafeteria: There is also a canteen in the MBU Campus along with a television facility to serve delicious meals and snacks to everyone including students and their parents followed by staff members at an affordable price. The traditional South Indian, and North Indian dishes along with Nepalese food items, Chinese items, snacks, bakery items, and beverages are served in this canteen. Last but not least, the canteen which remains open from 7 AM to 8 PM is even used by students for small celebrations.
Halls and Auditorium: Apart from the above-mentioned ones, MBU has big halls and auditoriums to organize events and activities like symposiums, guest lectures, seminars webinars, etc.

Sports and Games Facilities: To keep students physically and mentally fit and bring out hidden talents of aspiring athletes and sports enthusiasts, the University has all the required amenities including playgrounds, a stadium, indoor courts as well as several centers for physical education for various kinds of indoor and outdoor sports activities such as Volleyball, Basketball, Kho-Kho, Kabadi, Football and Cricket, which students regularly enjoy playing post their classes. To regularly motivate students for sports activities, the Department of Physical Education organizes separate Intramural tournaments for Men and Women separately for different kinds of sports and games. Apart from this, selection trials to form teams for various sports disciplines for Inter-University and other tournaments are also arranged by the Department from time to time.

faqs.question: Why should I join Andhra Pradesh-based Mohan Babu University?
faqs.answer: The Mohan Babu University of Andhra Pradesh has been delivering top-quality and employment-oriented education for the past 30 years. Also, the variety of courses the University offers to today’s ambitious youths and professionals covers almost every industrial domain. Apart from this, the University has expert mentors and qualified trainers to teach students and train them for placements and all world-class amenities are present on campus which students might need during their tenure of course. Hence, the courses, faculty members, and global learning-networking opportunities MBU offers to its students make it a perfect place for anyone to join it.

faqs.question: Does MBU offer any kind of accommodation facilities to students?
faqs.answer: The Mohan Babu University of Andhra Pradesh has a total of 6 housing blocks with an accommodation capacity of 100 students in each and each block is then further divided into 10-15 dormitories, with a residing strength of 8-12 students in each. The rooms of these hostels are well-ventilated, and spacious and have clean washrooms, which gives a home-like ambiance to students away from their homes. Security of students in these hostels is ensured through a 24*7-hour surveillance system and 40 well-trained security guards, most of them are ex-servicemen, and the campus is well-resourced with amenities like 24-hour power supply, mineral water plant, a tuck shop that makes available toiletries, stationary, light snacks, and confectionery to students followed by amazing dining spaces to serve tasty, nutrition-rich and hygienic food to students with a seating capacity of 900 people at once.

faqs.question: What opportunities a Graduate can get after pursuing a Bachelor of Hotel Management and Catering Technology from MBU Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: A diverse range of career opportunities will be available for students after pursuing a Bachelor of Hotel Management and Catering Technology from Mohan Babu University and they can primarily work as Airline Catering Managers, Hotel Managers and Club Managers, Cabin Operations Managers, Cruise Hotel Managers, Forest Lodging Manager, Tourism Manager or can even start their own business and become an Entrepreneur.

Section.name: About MBU
Section.description:
Mohan Babu University is an Andhra Pradesh-based leading private university that was established 30 years ago under the aegis of Sree Vidyanikethan Educational Trust and offers a total of 104 wide-ranging UG and PG courses in the discipline of Commerce, design, Science, Arts, Business Administration, Engineering and Technology followed by Physiotherapy and Hotel Management, etc. The University is accredited by the prestigious NBA and NAAC with A+ and certified by ISO and admission to its courses is granted based on marks obtained by a candidate in last year’s qualifying exam and a score on the entrance exam. Apart from this, the University has an industry-driven curriculum and expert instructors to teach students, world-class facilities, and 65+ clubs to help ambitious youths learn, explore, and lead in the best way possible.
The strength of MBU lies in its 20k+ worldwide Alumni, 95% amazing placement records and 2200+ job offers students have secured in multiple reputed organizations. Also, for its amazing work in the education sector and offering employment-oriented knowledge in various sectors, University was ranked 165 no. by NIRF and has received the status of Platinum category by CII-AICTE Survey, ‘Excellent Band’ in the Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) by Ministry of Education (MoE), Govt. of India and 'A' Grade by Department of Higher Education - Andhra Pradesh.
Direct Link to Apply for MBU Admissions
MBU has signed MOUs Salesforce Academy, Amazon AWS Academy, Red Hat Academy, BluePrism Academy, CISCO Networking Academy, Palo Alto Cyber Security Academy, Juniper, I Cloud Technologies of USA, Tirupati Smart City Corporation, University Tenaga National of Malaysia, Confederation of Indian Industry and IUCEE etc. to organize Guest lectures, FDPs, Industrial visits and offering Certification Programs on latest technologies, internships and hands-on learning experience through real-world projects to students and has collaborated with L&T EduTech, SAP, IBM and NanoChip Solutions for B.Tech programs. The university also provides 100% placement assistance and guidance for entrance exams like GATE and a recent placement drive at MBU saw a whopping salary package of INR 60 LPA. Amazon, HCL Technologies, Infosys, TCS, CGI, Justdial, NIIT, and Capgemini are some of the top recruiters of the University.
